page.title: 15Housing Survey
page.content: TYPE TOTAL TYPE TOTAL Flats 10 Tied Cottages 13 Semi-Detached 71 Mobile Homes 2 Detached 280 Bungalows 25 Terraced 11 Cottages 4 Mansions 7 Holiday Homes 1 Farmhouses 19 The area of south Lyndhurst is mainly a residential area of predominantly detached houses. This indicates the prosperous nature of the people living here. Many people are moving to this area because of high employment and this is why some large estates have been built to accommodate them. These new estates are not liked by the foresters as they are all similar and the foresters have cottages which are all different and some are thatched. Most of the foresters houses are tied cottages, that is, owned by the Forestry Commission.
